description: Gather the materials needed for making tea
name: Gather materials
pseudocode:
1. Identify all necessary materials for making tea.
2. List the materials needed. 
3. Collect the materials.

name: Prepare materials
pseudocode:
1. Get tea leaves or tea bags.
2. Get a mug or teapot.
3. Get a source of hot water (kettle, etc).
4. Get any desired additions (milk, sugar, lemon, etc).
